_sText:
A mario jump map I made. 

Has multiple jump courses to jump on, the ? Boxes at the beginning of the map can spawn weapons when jumped under.

Music is played throughout the map, from the theme of super Mario.
Custom sounds are included to add to the experience.


The reason why the map is in fullbright, is because lighting looked really ugly and looked more of a mario theme if it was in fullbright.

As a mapper who is against the idea of floating jump platforms, I used some only because Mario games actually have stuff floating in mid air.


Enjoy this map

-Disturbed











Thanks to iconic . for the Mario Textures
